LanguageData.ARA_GestaltBandwidthTip: The hive network is the system used by the Arachne swarm to establish Gestalt thought clusters, which allows the entire swarm to gain strong consistency under the unified command of the Queen species.
LanguageData.ARA_GestaltBandwidthExceeded: Warning: The hive network is being overloaded, which will directly affect the queen's mood and may lead to a conductive collapse of the entire network!
LanguageData.ARA_SwarmSpell_Research_DescriptionText: Insect swarm evolution points are special resources unique to the Arachne Isthid. Illithids can acquire evolution points by devouring incapacitated captives, and invest them in upgrading personal abilities or researching the special technology of the swarm.
LanguageData.ARA_SwarmSpell_Load_Critical: Warning: Nerve bundle load approaching limit!
LanguageData.ARA_SwarmSpell_Load_DescriptionText: The nerve bundle load is evaluated based on the degree of nerve bundle load caused by the Arachne Isthid's use of insect swarm psychic spells - as a mobile spell turret, the Illithid can release various insect swarm psychic spells almost infinitely, at the cost of possibly burning its own brain, and it must be discharged as psychic entropy when the load is too large.
LanguageData.ARA_SwarmSpell_Gizmo_Hint: Move your mouse over the indicator bar to see further details
LanguageData.ARA_SwarmSpell_SystemNotAvailable: {0}'s swarm psionic spell system is unavailable
LanguageData.ARA_SwarmSpell_Load_OverloadWarning: Warning: Nerve bundles loaded beyond capacity!
LanguageData.ARA_SwarmSpell_Gizmo_OverloadWarning: Warning: The unit is overloaded and cannot cool down on its own!
LanguageData.ARA_SwarmSpell_Cooldown_Behavior: After the cooldown is over, the load is reduced by 1 point every 2 seconds.
LanguageData.ARA_SwarmSpell_Load_Recovery: After cooling down, the nerve bundle load will be automatically reduced
